thread.title: Sonia Bautista

author: Sonia Bautista
title: Sonia Bautista
text: Thought I'd be scouring the internet for hours when I first started and ended up making a phone call to the original vendor that we bought the equipment from. That phone call indicated to me that I needed to focus on another avenue. Checked the name RapidRun and quickly came to this site, made a quick call, and the rep walked me through the three parts I needed. Courteous, knowledgeable, and patient. You guys rock! The relief I felt once I realized that hours turned into [literally] a few minutes. The day's efficiency rating just went through the roof. Yeah!
